# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-102">Avansert Outlook.com sikkerhet for Microsoft 365-abonnenter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-103">Alle Outlook.com-brukere drar nytte av søppel post og filtrering av skadelig program vare.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal-abonnenter utfører Outlook.com ekstra screening av vedlegg og koblinger i meldinger du mottar.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-105">Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du lese [avansert Outlook.com sikkerhet for Microsoft 365-abonnenter](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-106">Hvis du vil aktivere eller deaktivere sikre koblinger, går du til [sikkerhets innstillingene for Premium](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="2b0fb-107">**Innstillinger**  >  **Premium**  >  **Sikkerhet**).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2b0fb-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
